items.longDescription:
Animal Crossing New Horizons

Nintendo Switch’s “Animal Crossing: New Horizons” lets you enjoy a free and easy life on a deserted island where time flows just like in real life. The “Animal Crossing” designs for UT that feature such island life will delight people across generations.

© 2020 Nintendo
items.name: WOMEN Animal Crossing UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: “Animal Crossing”, which allows you to connect with your friends anytime, is now available from UT! Check out the impressively wide variety of designs!

items.longDescription:
FUTURALABORATORIES

FUTURALABORATORIES is a design company and lifestyle brand created by the artist FUTURA2000 in 1997, as a spinoff group to the parent company at that time; PROJECTDRAGON. FUTURALABORATORIES has always worked closely with UMBRELLA FILMS for visual amplification and TARANTULA DESIGNS as a graphic think tank. The brand has created many collections over multiple decades and found numerous partners in various collaborative efforts. FUTURALABORATORIES was rebooted in 2019 with excitement and engagement across multiple platforms.

Stay-fresh leggings with built-in UV protection. Adds a style accent in layered looks.
- The distinctive print by Futura is perfect for casual or sporty outfits.

Futura Laboratories LLC.
items.name: WOMEN FUTURA LABORATORIES AIRism UV Protection Soft Leggings
items.shortDescription: Stay-fresh leggings with built-in UV protection. Adds a style accent in layered looks.UPF40

items.longDescription:
Roy Lichtenstein

Roy Lichtenstein was a forerunner and main figure in the pop art movement of the 1960’s. He established his vivid style by utilizing simple black outlines, bright primary colors found in ads and comics, and halftone dots used in newsprint. He is remembered fondly for depicting not only characters from comics, but also creating new works in his own style in dialogue with great historic artists like Picasso, Matisse, and Monet, among others.

© 2020 Estate of Roy Lichtenstein. All rights reserved.
Roy Lichtenstein™
items.name: WOMEN Roy Lichtenstein UT(Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)

items.longDescription:
- Used compression denim that was jointly developed with Kaihara, the world's leading denim manufacturer.
- Used stretch thread for the wefts, giving them better kickback and compression when worn.
- Good kickback so they are not too tight, and have straighter lines to make your legs look beautiful.
- Used special material that tightens around your stomach with just the right amount for the front pockets.
- Ankle-length, high rise, and skinny straight silhouette make your legs look sleek.
- The stitch colors are relaxed tones, so they can be paired with both casual and dressier styles.
- Legs that look even more slim, with laser processing that was achieved through repeated trial and error.
- In response to customer feedback, we made the fit slightly slimmer up to below the knees, to get lines that are not saggy.
items.name: WOMEN High Rise Skinny Ankle Jeans(Bc)
items.shortDescription: Added laser processing to this special denim. Your knees and stomach area will look sleek just by wearing these.
